name: StateCapitalAirportQuizGame
0:
”Alexa, open state capital airport quiz game”
”Alexa, play state capital airport quiz game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: state capital airport quiz game
des:
Test your knowledge of the US states and their capital airports

States Quiz provides a fun way to keep your U.S. geography skills sharp.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch State Capital Airport Quiz Game" or "Alexa, open State Capital Airport Quiz Game" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
